PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
ZigBee Cluster Library

ZigBee Cluster Library (ZCL) is a part of BitCloud Profile Suite SDK, which is intended to be used to createfully ZigBee compliant software for Smart Energy, Building Automation and Home Automation devices.

ZCL implements a set of standard ZigBee clusters. A cluster is a related collection of commands and attributes, which together define an interface to a specific functionality available on a given device. Each one of SE, BA, and HA applications may utilize some of the clusters defined in the ZCL.
